Workouts of the Day

Form is key. It‘s not what you do—it‘s how you do it that matters most

Super simple workout of the day helps distract you with the gym when daily life gets boring. We use cookies to help you track your workouts.

tap the ? to watch form tips

Strength Workout

Go back home

Week 1

Day 1 — Chest & Biceps Max

23 August, 2017
Max Effort. Warm up first! Work up in weight slowly. Add weight in small increments and keep your reps to five or fewer until you reach a load that allows you only three to five reps. When you’ve maxed out those reps, move on to the next exercise.

RM = Reps Max: Heaviest you can do this many reps at before failure
Workout Details
Barbell Bench Press ?
Max Effort
3-5 RM
DB Bench Press ?
4
8
Machine Fly
5
12-15
Seated DB Biceps Curl ?
4

DB Hammer Curl ?

Barbell Bicep Curl ?
4

Day 3 — Cardio

26 August, 2017
Use the exercise of your choice to raise your heart rate to a moderate level (120–140 beats per minute) and keep it there for 30 to 60 minutes. Afterward, foam roll and stretch.
Workout Details
Cardio of your choice (swim, bike, run, lindy hop)
1-3 ex
30-60m total
Complete this workout

Day 4 — Legs Max

27 August, 2017
Max Effort. Warm up first! Work up in weight slowly. Add weight in small increments and keep your reps to five or fewer until you reach a load that allows you only three to five reps. When you’ve maxed out those reps, move on to the next exercise.

RM = Reps Max: Heaviest you can do this many reps at before failure
